name: Primus 230 Butane/Propane Canister
description: These canisters contain a mixture of butane, isobutane, and propane for effective warm weather use. A self-sealing valve allows removal of partially consumed canisters for packing or travel.Each canister contains 225g of fuel and boils about 15L of water.Performance falls off below 0°C unless the stove has a preheating coil.
